Title: Imaikkaa Nodigal
Writer: R. Ajay Gnanamuthu, Pattukottai Prabhakar (dialogue writer)
Actors: Nayanthara, Atharvaa Murali, Anurag Kashyap, Raashi Khanna
Plot: A suave CBI officer (Nayanthara), is in search of a serial killer who kidnaps and kills the children of important people. The killer, however, is targeting his nemesis next.
